title: Allocate Excavator to Foundation Work
description: A site manager needs to allocate an available excavator to the foundation excavation task for the next five days.

tasks.description: Check the equipment schedule for the availability of an excavator.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that 'Excavator #2' is available for the required period.

tasks.description: Assign 'Excavator #2' to the 'Foundation Excavation' task in the project plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The resource allocation in the project plan is updated successfully.
